TypeSignature.Value: public interface Grid.IGridList<T> : System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<T>, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<T>, System.Collections.Generic.IList<T> where T : View

.class nested public interface auto ansi abstract Grid/IGridList`1<(class Xamarin.Forms.View) T> implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<!T>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.typeparam: The type of elements in the grid.
Docs.summary: List interface with overloads for adding elements to a grid.

Docs.param: The column to add the view to.
The row to add the view to.
Docs.summary: Adds a view to the List at the specified location with a RowSpan and HeightSpan of 1.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (Xamarin.Forms.View view, int left, int right, int top, int bottom);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Add(class Xamarin.Forms.View view, int32 left, int32 right, int32 top, int32 bottom) cil managed

Docs.param: The left edge of the column span. Must be greater than 0.
The right edge of the column span. Must be greater than left.
The top edge of the row span. Must be greater than 0.
The bottom edge of the row span. Must be greater than top.
Docs.summary: Adds a view to the List at the specified row and column spans.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddHorizontal(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Xamarin.Forms.View> views) cil managed

Docs.summary: Add a collection views to the List such that they are horizontally stacked to the right of the current contents of the Grid.
Docs.remarks: The final span of each view is defined to be the height of the grid at the add time, and one column wide at the end of the current arrangement.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddHorizontal(class Xamarin.Forms.View view) cil managed

Docs.summary: Add a view to the List such that it is horizontally stacked to the right of the current contents of the Grid.
Docs.remarks: The final span of the view is defined to be the height of the grid at the add time, and one column wide at the end of the current arrangement.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddVertical(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Xamarin.Forms.View> views) cil managed

Docs.summary: Add a collection views to the List such that they are vertically stacked below the current contents of the Grid.
Docs.remarks: The final span of each view is defined to be the width of the grid at the add time, and one row tall at the end of the current arrangement.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddVertical(class Xamarin.Forms.View view) cil managed

Docs.summary: Add a view to the List such that it is vertically stacked below the current contents of the Grid.
Docs.remarks: The final span of the view is defined to be the width of the grid at the add time, and one row tall at the end of the current arrangement.
